name: The Hospital
description:
Embark on a horrific journey of discovery; unearth a buried past.  

The Hospital is a short, first-person, narrative-driven horror adventure from Crux Game Studios featuring:

  • Story-driven, explorative gameplay
  • Intense scares
  • Compelling, linear narrative
  • Original soundtrack 
  • Bite-sized thrill — average playtime of 30 - 45 mins
